'''1.19.4 Release Candidate 3''' (known as '''1.19.4-rc3''' in the launcher) is the third and final release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.19.4]], released on March 13, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-19-4-release-candidate-3|Minecraft 1.19.4 Release Candidate 3|March 13, 2023}}</ref> which fixes a bug.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.19.4 Release Candidate 3

|260901|Guardians deal thorns damage even while their spikes are retracted.
